item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.0.8
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.0.8
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 13 Feb 2025 23:41:20 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: Issues:
- #20: new API format (ie, setMagnet instead of Set Magnet)
- #22: Instrument Framework v1.14(.4)
- #23: Update to QDInsrtumetn.dll v1.0.7 enables OptiCool
- #24: Change PPMS3 persistent/driven magnet
- #25: SMO v2/Instrument Framework v2
- #26: Select temperature approach mode (Channel 0: FastSettle, 0: No Overshoot)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Build Support v1.4.0.6
item.description:
Product: Build Support v1.4.0.6
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 13 Feb 2025 18:00:43 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Miscellaneous VIs help build applications and packages

Release Notes: - Updated Post Build Scripts
- Added Post Build Script (G-CLI build) (experimental)
- Powershell Terminal preferred over CMD - gives intermediate stdout, enables powershell scripts
- other updates and bug fixes
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Krohn-Hite-7008 v2.1.0.10
item.description:
Product: Krohn-Hite-7008 v2.1.0.10
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 10 Feb 2025 12:48:46 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Drivers and UI for Krohn-Hite 7008 multichannel amplifiers.

Release Notes: - SMO/Instrument Framework v2
- Updated JSONschema (string enums)
- Multiline insert to postgres
- Trap errors coming from VISA open and prompt user to close any open connections
- 32 and 64 bit applications

item.title: JKI State Machine Objects (SMO) v2.0.0.73
item.description:
Product: JKI State Machine Objects (SMO) v2.0.0.73
Company: JKI
Release Date: Mon, 10 Feb 2025 11:55:59 -0500
Packager: JKI

Description: The JKI State Machine Objects (SMO) for LabVIEW is an easy-to-use yet powerful object-oriented framework, based on the JKI State Machine. It is the very same framework that is used by the JKI team in our everyday project work, and is the result of years of refinement by our team of LabVIEW experts.

<b>Get the Source Code:</b>
All the source code is available on our GitHub repository (https://github.com/JKISoftware/JKI-State-Machine-Objects) where you can download the framework and make your own changes. You can also download the built package.

<b>Discuss by Asking Questions & Presenting Your Ideas:</b>
The JKI SMO NI Community Group (https://decibel.ni.com/content/groups/jki-state-machine-objects) is a great place to have discussions about your ideas and feedback.

Release Notes: LVLIB + LV2019
item.dc:creator: JKI
